# Pubudu Tharanga - AI Engineer & Full Stack Developer

> Personal portfolio and professional profile of Pubudu Tharanga

## Overview

Pubudu Tharanga is an AI Engineer and Full Stack Developer from Sri Lanka, specializing in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and modern web technologies. Currently pursuing BSc Hons in Information Systems at Sabaragamuwa University of Sri Lanka.

## Professional Summary

- **Name:** Pubudu Tharanga
- **Title:** AI Engineer & Full Stack Developer
- **Location:** Sri Lanka
- **Website:** https://pubudu-tharanga.vercel.app
- **Email:** pubudutharange@gmail.com
- **Phone:** +94-76-633-0916

## Technical Skills

### Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
- Deep Learning (TensorFlow, PyTorch)
- Generative AI & Large Language Models (LLMs)
- OpenAI API Integration
- Computer Vision
- Natural Language Processing

### Full Stack Development
- **Frontend:** React, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend:** Node.js, Express.js, Python
- **Databases:** MongoDB, PostgreSQL, MySQL
- **Tools:** Git, Docker, Vite

## Education

- **BSc Hons in Information Systems** (In Progress)
  - Sabaragamuwa University of Sri Lanka
